name: Prison Basement
description:
this is a short bullet hell game I created for the Wayfair Games bullet hell game jam. It was created in 10 days by me and my friend johnyouslydog. Check out his youtube channel: https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCaZ4-YUJk4NzaudG4y1d2NA 

Also check out my other projects. I will continue making games, as well as participating in more game jams.

Play in browser on PC, or download the files for Windows 10. (Downloading may offer better performance, and there may be unaccounted for bugs in the HTML export.)
